nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Tile

Class TileType<T extends Tile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Tile.TileType<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class this factory will be creating instances of.

    public class TileType<T extends Tile>
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory creates new instances of the class the programmer specifies in the constructor.
